author: Farah Najjar
title: UNSC to vote on resolution condemning Russian invasion: Live News
description: Vote expected as EU and US agree to impose sanctions on Russian president, foreign minister for invasion of Ukraine.
content:
• UN Security Council will meet on Friday to vote on resolution condemning Russias attack on Ukraine.
